name: RocketOwl Inc.
tag_list: apple, canada, first, facebook, flash, gaming, greenspace, ios, mobile, clean-tech, ottawa, ontario, start-up, games, news, vlog
overview:
RocketOwl Inc. is a game development company headquartered in Ottawa, Ontario. The company specializes in creating high-quality, fun and engaging games for online social and mobile networks. They are focused on building and promoting an innovative and creative gaming culture.

RocketOwl is developing original titles for multiple platforms, and they are among the first companies to provide universal porting to our games. The company was founded with a focus on creating a fundamentally fun game first, with the belief that fully immersing players in the game world is the best way to communicate their message.

RocketOwl’s games are available on Facebook and iOS for the iPad, and are coming soon to Android and Windows 8.
